mapper.select: SELECT upg.id, upg.user_id, upg.permission_group_id, upg.gmt_create, upg.gmt_modified FROM permission_group AS pg LEFT JOIN user_permission_group AS upg ON pg.id = upg.permission_group_id WHERE upg.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
